Detailed Description

implements median/barycenter heuristics

average.cxx 40 2007-07-25 20:20:44Z mfms

Function Documentation

bool average (  BiGraph &  bg,
double  ratio = 0.0,
bool  stable = true
) 
 

PRE: 0.0 <= ratio <= 1.0 POST: a weighted combination of median and barycenter heuristics has been done on the V0 side of bg; ratio = 0.0 for median, 1.0 for barycenter; stable is true if the sort is a stable insertion sort. retval == true iff the order has changed (a change in order among elements having equal keys in an unstable sort does not count!)
